title: Hyundai Motor Company
description: Hyundai Motor Company is recognized in the automotive industry by its distinctive brand colors: Navy Blue (Hex: #002C5F) and White (Hex: #FFFFFF). These colors are detailed in Hyundai's style guide, available at https://nawrot.hyundai.pl/fileadmin/share/pdf/Hyundai_styleguide_20200915.pdf.
